lines.text: Howdy, Bates. How's the undertaking business?
Oh, this town is too healthy. If something don't happen soon, I'll have to vamoose.

[responding to a threat from Ben]
You and whose army?
You must be the joker in the deck.
Well, one things for certain. I ain't the queen.
Well, I'm not so sure. You're acting like an old woman.
